item.title: Podman for Debian based systems
item.description: Here is a link to the bash-script to configure apt repository for Podman . The script is available as a GitHub Gist. Hence, you are requested to open the link to the bash-script and download the script (or, copy-paste into a file using a text-editor) to use it directly from your Debian-based system such as Debian, Ubuntu or LinuxMint (including LMDE). The script will setup the proper apt repository configuration file under /etc/apt/sources.
